laptop and number of great compartments, but the material it is made from feels kind of stiff and inexpensive. it can get bit complicated remembering where something is, especially if you have lot of stuff. this backpack has very pleasing look, mostly black with orange accents and is nice conservative shape. the amazon sleeve is simply neoprene, which snags and has so much friction, it does not in charger.amazon power fast usb charger got this for my kindle tablet does an excellent job charging the kindle fire lot faster than the one it came with the kindle fireamazon powerfast wall charger best kindle charger ever. this charger is great for trips where we need charge in the vehicle or while visiting relatives!great charger bought this for my new kindle since they no longer come with chargers. it takes less time to fully charge and the charge lasts longer.great item have been using this item and it seems to be working quite well.great service, great purchase found that was immediately sked by staff member if needed help. kindle does not even provide usb cable so that you can charge from your computer. you only get what you pay for arrived on time well packed best affordable tablet for under was able to get advertisements off from amazon and installed playstore. latest model will satisfy your needscheap opton is cheap tablet option coming from amazon.  its packed with amazon marketing stuff which is fine if you use them but most just take up space for us. my kids mainly use them for game apps and youtube videos which am seem to work great. overall happy with it and the price was good for this type of tablet.decent tablet for the price overall, very impressed especially when compared to my ipad mini this tablet does it all and makes for an excellent e-reader, while also boasting specifications that rival any ipad.decent tablet but not high caliber the display is not as sharp and vivid as they say but still good. we will wait until newer version comes out that is improved.disappointed have always gone to buy kindle because like the books and th games available. its packed with amazon marketing stuff which is fine if you use them but most just take up space for us. my kids mainly use them for game apps and youtube videos which am seem to work great. overall happy with it and the price was good for this type of tablet.decent tablet for the the only thing purchase bought this for my elderly mother to play games, get email and pics via instagram, etc.  he loves itgenerally good tablet the general use for this tablet is only worth for amazon users mostly so unless your buy and use amazon products, do not recommend this to anyone else. the tablet is not excellent compared to others but it is fairly good for an affordable price.get online without hassle intuitive user interface, rapid online access through well designed features, light weight, ergonomic buttons for volume and power. overall thoroughly well designed, excellent priced device for web browsing and social media.gets the job done was not sure what to expect from this little tablet at such low price but am impressed! uses it all the time and would recommend.gift excellent priced device for web browsing and social media.gets the job done was not sure what to expect from this little tablet at such low price but am impressed! uses it all the time and would recommend.gift got this for my sister as gift. he loves itgenerally good tablet the general use for this tablet is only worth for amazon users mostly so unless your buy and use amazon products, do not for yr old daughter. other then that it is not high powered game playing tablet or anything to keep lots of storage on.  while am not an amazon tablet fan this device meets all the requirements had price point that made the decision really easy. if you are used to an ipad, the fire hd is little disappointing but it costs considerably less. after reading reviews of both kindle fire and ipad apps available than apple or google play.great tablet for the price my old kindle was not working so good anymore so bought this one on black friday deal from best buy. the only problem had was that at times it did not seem to be charging well or fast. it sometimes freezes with some of the games but other apps work great. do wish it was true android platform instead of the amazon android platform, but overall it is great little tablet!great tablet for the price was present for my year old grandson. if had one downfall its the smaller amount of apps available than apple or google black friday deal from best buy. the only problem had was that at times it did not seem to be charging well or fast. it sometimes freezes with some of the games but other apps work great. do wish it was true android platform instead of the amazon android platform, but overall it is great little tablet!great tablet for the price was present for my year old grandson. if had one downfall its the this amazon fire tablet has been pretty user-friendly for an old man like me.  buying an ipad mini the build quality is just not there.ipod nano had very small nano and needed to have more space for songs that are just coming out and so far love it. when saw the hd in kiosk in bb store, realized how much better liked the size and feel of it for reading books this fire clarity is much improved over my old one, plus it responds better. nice price for the new model with alexa built in and expandable storage!it is great product! had been thinking about getting reader for while but did not know expanded memory to gb so that was good selling point for me. was not expecting perfection with the colors but people skin tones appeared greenish as if they were vulcans. however, it has alexa and integrates well with my philips hue equipment.keeps the wife happy and thus me as well wife loves it so makes my life better what else do you need to know past that.kid friendly nice easy-to-use tablet. he will enjoy it for hours.kindle fan wish could download google docs but otherwise very happy with my kindle fire.kindle fire great tablet! this kindle can have expanded memory to gb so that grandson, very easy to operate. for now, it helps me see things that are too small on my phone while am traveling. have heard of several others having the similar issues so hopefully this model lasts longer and has an improved charging port.nicely priced beginner tablet. faster than my old fire hd tablet purchased years ago...no android support this is good product for video, surfing and reading. tablets and our year old who has been down loading apps since she was around years of age so far this tablet has survived everything except the constant draining of battery when used by her .weak wifi was replacement for poorly functioning new purchase of kindle seems to be working fine, but some games loading from amazon have issues.works very well it is good, saves using up data usage on computer. until amazon loosens its grip, recommend only at very good price.worlks as advertised allows for reading of my kindle lib and even plays few gamesworth every dime!! very nice for light internet browsing, keeping on top of email, viewing videos, and reading books, which like to get free from the library. as said: everything want in tablet for less than $!you get what your paying for at ninety dollars, the expectionations are low, but this is still very good table, it is good for light use like watching videos or web browsing, but the camera is bit lacking, and at certain times the device can freeze or lag. !works so far this was replacement for poorly functioning new purchase of kindle seems to be working fine, but some games loading from amazon have issues.works very well tablet. it uses their version of the android os which they call the fire os which is decently responsive and fairly intuitive to use be aware that you cannot install or run most apps purchased from the google play store, but must rely on amazon own app store which is decent, but not as extensive as either apple or google.excellent product would recommend this excellent amazon fire tablet productexcellent product super easy to setup for the kids to use. it works well for me, however, my wife seems to have cold fingers, and the touch screen does not always respond. cons:isn't compatible with some of my google apps that use daily.does not operate the latest facebook updates love that can limit access and the amount of time my daughter uses this tablet. it uses their version of the but not as extensive as either apple or google.excellent product would recommend this excellent amazon fire tablet productexcellent product super easy to setup for the kids to use. it works well for me, however, my wife seems to have cold fingers, and the touch screen does not always respond. cons:isn't compatible with some of my google apps that use daily.does not operate the latest facebook wait to try it out! if she is happy am happygood and low cost great if you want to read, watch show, catch up on email, or casually browse the internet.good as long as it is plugged in to outlet. am normally an apple snob but needed cheap tablet and was very surprised how functional the amazon fire is.gave as gift the recipient of this tablet uses it often and loves it so much that am buying one for myself.gearfit once understand how to use this, it will be awesomegeat tablet for everyone so easy to use and navigate. am in the older generation that finds it hard to navigate electronics but not this tablet and best buy employees were great in helping me decide by giving tutorial and info on the tablet .gets the job done very satisfied with tablet, very fast and efficientgets the job done is it does not read the books as good as my older amazon kindle fire.great love my amazon fire tablet it does exactly what needed to do.great use this all the time for playing games and reading books, flavor that amazon modified and as such you can easily install the google playstore which allows you to download most of your favorite apps. install chrome, gmail, youtube, nicer keyboard app and many google apps as you like.also, for those concerned that about the amazon advertisements that show up only on the lock screen do not sweat it. no, you do not have to pay amazon the extra for an ad free made of super slippy material, hard to hold; get case for this or you will drop it; often. no youtube.overall: if you need simple tablet for light web browsing, shopping, music, movies, reading and staggering. it is budget tablet for anyone looking to do the basic web activities, games and music. the pad has better screen display and sound nice product got this for my year old mother. dont like that im not able to get the same apps on my android phone on this but its cool for what use it for.nice product is an awesome tablet with plenty of features that made for perfect gift.nice product. and smooth product this is nice one, very fast and smooth for daily operation.very fun amazon fire tablet is an outstanding piece of equipment. hes got plenty of pj masks episodes and games plus much more.very good inexpensive tablet my wife ipad mini had issues, she wore it flat out, and wanted to get another one but did not want to spend the money on new ipad, so we gave this one try. after bb reward zone got it for about $ish with gb of memory.to be clear, this is not on the same level as the ipad mini but it was not designed to. overall she likes it, which is good.so if you are wanting an inexpensive tablet from reliable company, try the fire tablet.very good price have long time with the battery life.. love the fire tabletvery good price and easy to use bought this computer gb fire for and love it.i do not do much on it but; emails, play games both on and off line, and go online for other social media like youtube etc.it takes pretty good pictures. my son likes to play the gave this one try. after bb reward zone got it for about $ish with gb of memory.to be clear, this is not on the same level as the ipad mini but it was not designed to. overall she likes it, which is good.so if you are wanting an inexpensive tablet from reliable company, try the fire tablet.very good price have long time with the battery life.. love the fire tabletvery good price and easy to use daily.does not operate the latest facebook updates.camera image quality is poor.pros:smooth interface, user friendly.good battery life.supports kids' separate profiles so that it may be shared by family members.easily syncs with other devices.excellent for monitoring the kids!! otherwise it is good tablet.durable gave this to my son who breaks everything and so far has lasted through couple bought both of my children one of these tablets...they love it.frees up parents phones can download games without using phone plan data. this inexpensive one fits the bill just fine.good for cheap it just for my son and he can get on and play games and watch videos no problem, the parental controls are amazing and keep him in his specific apps am big fan of this tablet, very functional for pricegood tablet has what is necessary for the average individuals needs.good tablet got this tablet so would not have to pack up my laptop when went to my boyfriend when want to do my online class. loaded fb and pintrest as well. good as an ereader or light tablet uses to surf internet, email and games. the perfect size to fit in my purse so that can take it with me. drop it many times and its still working.great tablet/reader for great price the graphics and sound on this tablet were better than expected!great to read variety of books it has clear screen, the books are easy to download, like the other features as well.great to use and handy here are my pros and cons thus far.pro:perfect size for ebooks, and web surfing to alleviate strain on the eyes from my phone displaynice sturdy casing that gives it nice heft but still weighs in as one of the lighter tablets on the marketchild accounts- amazon allows you to set up this tablet with age restricted access for kids making this low cost piece of tech that is perfect for school kids and allows mom and dad to ration the amount of time lil johnny can play clash of clans and how much he can hit the ol' visa card for.battery life thus faret for my grandson just love this tablet.does everything teenage grandson needs it to do! can check my emails, surf the web, down loaded fb and pintrest as well. good as an ereader or light tablet uses to surf internet, email and games. the perfect size to fit in my purse so that can take it with me. drop it many times and its still working.great tablet/reader for great price the graphics and sound on this tablet were better than expected!great to read variety of books it has clear screen, the books are easy to download, like the other features as well.great to use and handy web. will probably return this and get more capable tablet, but will give it another couple of days to get used to it before doing so.small tablet this tablet is on the smaller side but works for me.so far so good bought this item as gift for relative in her mid teens and so far no complaints.so improved my children love these kindles! have some issues with library check out and amazon.suits for what need for nursing class this works great for my college class because it is small and compact plus it is very fast. so far very happy.nd purchase first bought the fire hd for myself and liked plugged in to outlet. have no complaints...good cheap tablet great tablet especially for the price it is not an ipad by any means but will run and play lot of androids apps works off wifi and has micro ad card readergood cheap tablet was looking around for good cheap tablet and this was the best one could find especially because best buy was having sale so with the fire, case, stylus and microsd card only spent little over $. there are problems with installing apps like viber but still good purchase.good for its money. she loves it.gift for son looks nice cannot wait to try it out! if areas where other devices show strong signal!also, you should know that you cannot access any apps on the google play store; it is locked into amazon. we are so pleased with thict bought this for my content. the ability to make them do something educational like read for min before playing games is awesome. it has been helping on his development lot!great tablet had kindle fire and upgraded to this tablet for about month and have no complaints.  bought this tablet for my year old....when going on long cars rides it is nice to keep them entertained. the perfect size to fit in my purse so that can take it with me. did not think at first that would like this size but it is perfect for me. they do not have some of the games that you can download on an android market but other then that the tablets overall are great especially for kids sense they have child browsing adult browsing with parental locks.great tablets for reading books love this tablet have had several others but this brand works everytime..very happy with my purchasegreat to read variety of books it has clear screen, the books are easy to download, like the other features as well.great to use and handy here are my pros and cons thus far.pro:perfect size for ebooks, and web surfing to alleviate strain on the eyes from my phone displaynice sturdy casing that gives it nice heft but still weighs in as one of the lighter tablets on the marketchild accounts- amazon allows you to set up this tablet with age restricted access for kids making this low cost piece of tech that is perfect for school kids and allows mom and dad to ration the amount of time lil johnny can play clash of clans and how much he can hit the ol' visa card for.battery life thus far; wife was on it for about hours last night and battery was at about %kindle integration -this goes without saying but having my ebooks and audible books synced to the tablet is awesome and my kindle books look greatgreat to watch movies like to watch movies on it. bought this tablet for my year old....when going on long cars rides it is nice to keep them entertained. the perfect size to fit in my purse so that can take it with me. did not think at well.great to use and handy here are my pros and cons thus far.pro:perfect size for ebooks, and web surfing to alleviate strain on the eyes from my phone displaynice sturdy casing that gives it nice heft but still weighs in as one of the lighter tablets on the marketchild accounts- amazon allows you to set up this tablet with age restricted access for kids making this low cost piece of tech that is perfect for school kids and allows mom and dad to ration the amount of time lil johnny can play clash of clans and how much he can hit the ol' visa card for.battery life thus far; wife was on it the features thoroughly enjoy reading on this. probably need to take it into the store so that determination can be made and it can be fixed.i love my amazon fire tablet so love my amazon fire worthy.kindle love normally read my ebooks on my phone but my son beoke his tablet and so gave him mine and bought kindle for myself. not worth for the money.lamazon fire tablet one of my best buy this item is gift for family member.my reader and gamer too many advertising and too many pages to sort through.my sister gift bought my sister the original kindle years ago. its really draining on my phones battery life and data to keep tethering. the clarity and the washington post was an added feature, and fact that it was so easy to use.neat tablet this tablet is perfect for my needs which are mostly online books.needed to replace my broken kindlefire this was nice upgrade from my first kindle fire but the volume is just not high enough !! battery last much longer and it does not seem to phones battery life and data to keep tethering. the clarity and the washington post was an added feature, and fact that it was so easy to use.neat tablet this tablet is perfect for my needs which are mostly online books.needed to replace my broken kindlefire this was nice upgrade from my first kindle fire but the volume is just not high enough !! battery last much longer and it does not seem to granddaughter so that she would have something to play games and read books without having to use her mom devices. the camera takes great pictures even if child is bit shakey... sound quality is very good as is touch sensitivity.great first tab my daughters first tab,i love that it has protected case and parental controls my son will be jealous because it has more memory than hisgreat first tablet product my daughter is going to love this for christmas!!! also get my own side she cannot do anything unless give her action.cons: average battery life -hours tops of nonstop use and also wish that there was way to lock the screen while watching amazon, netflix or any other video app so when my daughter taps in any direction or anywhere that the videos would not stop playing.great product for child my year old daughter loves her fire for kids. setup was pretty easy with choosing preferred content based on characters/themes appropriate for their age group. moving our disney and other digital copies of movies was equally easy after signing in. he enjoys it lot!great product my daughter is going to love this for christmas!!! also get my own side she cannot do anything unless give not more toddler friendly.  good way to start children on tablets.kids kindle fire tablet got this for my month old son so that he can watch movies on our trip to la and he loved it. as advertised.kids love it... probably little too much but the device has excellent parental controls. you can limit their time, access and the things are built like tank.kids loved it few problems with games loading but over all goodkids loved it great tablet for children, lots of content. we have samsung galaxy tablet that our year old son uses, but we ended up getting second fire for him because it seemed very kid-friendly and did not have to worry about any inappropriate content popping up. good way to start children on tablets.kids kindle fire tablet got this for my month old son so that he goodkids loved it great tablet for children, lots of content. we have samsung galaxy tablet that our year old son uses, but we ended up getting second fire for him because it seemed very kid-friendly and did not have to worry about any inappropriate content popping up. good way to start children on tablets.kids kindle fire tablet got this for my month old son so that he can watch movies on our educational tool my year old granddaughter loves her amazo the case looked little flimsy but it has been great so far.great for year old great for my year old because he can play anything on there preferences set up. we are very happy with the amazon fire tablet.great educational tool my year old granddaughter loves her amazo  know the regular amazon fire is cheaper, but this one came with bumper, two year no question warranty and one year subscription to free time which allows kids to read lot of books and play great games for free. think everyone should have one for their child this is great product to help them learn and really affordable the people at best buy were really helpful.great for kids did not want to buy my year old something really expensive but wanted good device so tried this out and she loves it. it is entertaining and educational.great for kids my children love their new amazon fire tablet. however, as parent would rather have her play with the tablet because it has many free learning game apps.great for kids my grand children love kids tablets and play with them every day and their mother is using them to teach the kidsgreat for kids my granddaughter grand children love kids tablets and play with them every day and their mother is using them to teach the kidsgreat for kids my granddaughter loves it!  am so glad that picked the kindle, it comes with kids version of her own log in and is so easy for her to find appropriate games, movies, and apps, even though she cannot read yet. do not encourage lot of tv watching so the amozon fire was good substitute. really like the ability to set usage times which helps them learn to budget their time.great for my toddler purchased this tablet for my year old and he loves it. the only thing wish, was that it could access the google play store so my kids could watch the movies we have in our google play movies acmy year old bought this for my three year old when bought new car with no tv in it. am so glad that picked the kindle, it comes with kids version of her own log in and is so easy for her to find appropriate games, movies, and apps, even though she cannot read yet. do not encourage lot of tv watching so the amozon fire was good substitute. really like the ability to set usage times which helps them learn to budget their time.great for my toddler purchased this tablet for my year old and he loves it. the only thing wish, was that it could access the google play store so my kids could watch the movies we have in our google play movies acmy year old bought this for my three year old when bought new car with no tv in it. am so glad that picked the kindle, it comes with kids version of her own log in and is so easy for her to find appropriate games, movies, and apps, even though she cannot read yet. do not encourage lot of tv watching so the amozon fire was good substitute. really like the ability to set usage times which helps them learn to budget their time.great for my toddler purchased this tablet for my year old and he loves it. the only thing wish, was that it could access the google play store so my kids could watch the movies we have in our google play movies movies, and apps, even though she cannot read yet. do not encourage lot of tv watching so the amozon fire was good substitute. really like the ability to set usage times which helps them learn to budget their time.great for my toddler purchased this tablet for my year old and he loves it. the only thing wish, was that it could access the google play store so my kids could watch the movies we for my wife, and now am jealous!  repair was more than the fire brand new.almost perfect this was great buy can do it all.fair price great gamesalways good purchase this my second kindle .. it is light and faster than my previous kindle ..came with free audio books for days which is cool ... better screen .. it does seem to be long than wider .. which am ok with and got this on sale for .. great dealamazing highly recommend kindles. the battery life is amazing as was able to watch around full movies on single charge. speakers are better then my samsung galaxy s. for the price point of this tablet there is not single thing to complain. cloud storage offers simple access to your content from anywhere.amazon fire hd tablet gb wi-fi rating of starts is what can give this product. type of tablet.decent tablet for the price overall, very impressed especially when compared to my ipad mini this tablet does it all and makes for an excellent e-reader, while also boasting specifications that rival any ipad.decent tablet but not high caliber the display is not as sharp and vivid as they say but still good. we did not really get it for the games, but there is good how to use my kindle fire. it is very easy to setup and has features that did not utilize on previous fire tablets. there are parental controls which is plus, recommend for almost any age group.easy with internet benefits use this primarily as reader; however, it has smaller number of unread books that are not in the familiar carousel as in other kindle readers. as tablet it is faster, brighter and more clear than other tablets that have used for internet purposes. after slow start getting her going she is really enjoying the versatility of this tablet. although it does not have cellular data ability, which she had no use for, it gives her the flexibility to connect to wireless networks when she makes her weekly casino visits.good tablet fire is good tablet. it ‚äãis very functional flexibility to connect to wireless networks when she makes her weekly casino visits.good tablet fire is good tablet. it ‚äãis very functional and easy to use.good reader with internet benefits use she uses.great starter tablet for someone like myself. if you watch video..it buffers alot and laggs.great size for reading had an older kindle but it got virus. the only thing have against this one and internet well. wanted an inexpensive tablet for himsince he can be pretty rough with things. my wife ipad is light years ahead on this one, but what do you expect from dollar tablet.nice size was love how it has parental controls so can limit his time playing.perfect this is for my year old. high end users would not be satisfied with this tablet but overall an excellent value.overall good other things. know this sounds old fashioned, but it would be great to have user manual!  this is not high end tablet but it works really great for many of the things do. just wanted something convenient.tablet got this for my husband birthday and he loves ittablet love it, easy to operate. bought for each of our teenagers and they just love it... very cool reading features and zero buffering while watching netflix.terrible dont buy bought this around black friday for hoping it would be awesome... it failed so hard tried multiple different micro sd cards none of which were recognized and yes formated them with every format could think of ... fat, ntfs, fat, xfat... even tried to have the tablet do it... didnt work... to make matters worse half the apps wanted to use werent in the app store and came to find out that it isnt linked to the normal google play store this tablet has its own app store which is missing many common apps... the main reason bought this was to play clash of clans and cant because it wasnt on the app store... tried to also use aftermarket play stores to play coc but it didnt work... launched and played time but didnt work or update after that... needless to say returned it and bought samsung galaxy tab with s-pen and its wayyyyy better... bottom line you get what you pay for... also hint the s-pen version has an extra gb of ram over the non pen version... so you should get that if you can afford the extra $...terrific purchased two fire tablets for my children. purchased the hd to use as viewer for my pearl rearvision camera, which requires dual band wi-fi and blue tooth. this is not high end tablet but it works really great for many of the things do. just wanted something convenient.tablet got this for my husband birthday and he loves ittablet love it, easy to operate. bought for each of our teenagers and they just love it... very cool reading features and zero buffering while watching netflix.terrible dont buy bought this around black friday for hoping it would be awesome... it failed so hard tried multiple different micro sd cards none of which were recognized and yes formated them with every format could think of ... fat, ntfs, fat, xfat... even tried to have the tablet do it... didnt work... to make matters worse half the apps wanted to use werent in the app store and came to find out that it isnt linked to the normal google play store this tablet has its own app store which is missing many common apps... the main reason bought this was to play clash of clans and cant because it wasnt on the app store... tried to also use aftermarket play stores to play coc but it didnt work... launched and played time but didnt work or update after that... needless to say returned it and bought samsung galaxy tab with s-pen and its wayyyyy better... bottom line you get what you pay for... also hint the s-pen version has an extra gb of ram over the non pen version... so you should get that if you can afford the extra $...terrific purchased two fire tablets for my children. purchased the hd to use as viewer for my pearl rearvision camera, which requires dual band wi-fi and blue tooth. this is not is not high end tablet but it works really great for many of the things do. just wanted something convenient.tablet got this for my husband birthday and he loves ittablet love it, easy to operate. bought for each of our teenagers and they just love it... very cool reading features and zero buffering while watching netflix.terrible dont buy bought this around black friday for hoping it would be awesome... it failed so hard tried multiple different micro sd cards none of which were recognized and yes formated them with every format could think of ... fat, ntfs, fat, xfat... even tried to have the tablet do it... didnt work... to make matters worse half the apps wanted to use werent in the app store and came to find out that it isnt linked to the normal google play store this tablet has its own app store which is missing many common apps... the main reason bought this was to play clash of clans and cant because it wasnt on the app store... tried to also use aftermarket play stores to play coc but it didnt work... launched and played time but didnt work or update after that... needless to say returned it and bought samsung galaxy tab with s-pen and its wayyyyy better... bottom line you get what you pay for... also hint the s-pen version has an extra gb of ram over the non pen version... so you should get that if you can afford the extra $...terrific purchased two fire tablets
